summary:
Several \"cheat\" files for which i sometimes use...
Containing More Enemies in the Skyrim world
Containing More money to the merchant NPC
descriptionHtml:
Followings are files which i use for my own use, and still if this suits you...
i share this with you. ^ ^

This kind of MODs already exist here and there, I just use mine for my own use. ^ ^
I just want to put these here to relate my humble city MODs as a common tool.

==========================
More Enemies in the world
==========================
I put many more enemies all of the skyrim.
Most of them are bandits, but there are Draugrs/Thalmors/Thieves/Assassins/Giants too.

I put their health much higher than the Vanilla, so if the battle should be little bit tough.
If you feel this is so hard, use the optional BAT file \"starter00X\", this will help you. 

But my BAT files are CHEATING, so not lore-friendly at all.

When you use my cheating BAT files, be cautious. ^ ^


==========================
More Enemy Variation
==========================
This mod adds more variation on humanoid enemies such as Dualwield bandit/mage bandit of more spells/forsworn wearing various armors.




==========================
More Money to the merchant NPC
==========================
I put much more money to the merchant NPC (65000 gold or so).
They have lots of money now so that you can sell more valuable things.


==========================
Cheating BAT file: starter00X
==========================
This enhance your abilities as follows;
\"bat starter004b\"
- Heal regenerate rate
- Magicka regenerate rate
- Stamina regenerate rate
- Carry weight
- Critical chance
- Un-armed melee damage
- Weapon speed
- Shout recovery

\"bat starter005\"
- Add max health 1000
- Add max magicka 1000
- Add max stamina 1000

For the detailed vlue of each parameter, open the file and check.

For the use of this BAT file;
1. Enter in the cosole mode 
2. Type \"bat starter00X\" (X depends on what you wanna use by choosing 4b/5/6)
3. Press \"Enter\"

==========================
Cheating BAT file: npcspeed001
==========================
This enhance NPC abilities as \"starter00X\"
If you think your followers follow you slowly, use this one.
This makes them move very faster ~~~.... But remember this is cheating...

For the detailed vlue of each parameter, open the file and check.

For the use of this BAT file;
1. Enter in the cosole mode 
3. Point the NPC whom you want to enchance
2. Type \"bat npcspeed001\" (Little bit too long,,,, sorry)
3. Press \"Enter\"


==========================
Starter follower: Bigs and Wedge
==========================
I put 2 followers Bigs and Wedge just in the first room of Helgen keep.
Use these Bigs and Wedge until you obtain Sven/Lydia or some other followers. ^ ^

Bigs is skilled with 1 Handed, Wedge is skilled with 2 Handed.
These 2 followers don\'t cast spells, instead I put all of the \"Shouts\" in their abilities including Dragon breathes.
So when they are not in melee range, they shout Freeze/Fire dragon breath and close the distance to the enemies.

To make them follow, use my \"bat friend\" too. 


==========================
BAT file: friend
==========================
This BAT file is very useful when you want someone to follow you. ^ ^
This BAT works for the NPCs who has \"Follower\" dialogue, though... (If they dont have dialogue, this BAT doesnt work)

For the use of this BAT file;
1. Enter in the cosole mode 
3. Point the NPC whom you want to follow
2. Type \"bat friend\"
3. Press \"Enter\"


=========================
 My other mod
=========================
- Marians Lake Port Riften
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18111/

- Marians Splash Markarth
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18507
author: MarianHawk
